_p3mm_config Struct Reference

#include <p3utils.h>

Detailed Description

Structure: p3mm_config

Description:
The configuration data sent by the user space application to the kernel module. The pri and sec pointers indicate whether the space is being used by a primary, a secondary, or a primary plus secondary. Both must be cast to the appropriate definition structure.

Data Fields

void * pri
void * sec
int array_size
int hb_wait
int hb_fail

Default heartbeat period in seconds
